sentences.english: If the system can use NESYS upgrade for the Japanese version of the arcade.
sentences.chinese: 如果利用NESYS系統能爲日本版街機升級。

sentences.english: Got a combo of 50 in Arcade mode.
sentences.chinese: 在街機模式下完成50連擊。

sentences.english: Performed a roll in Arcade Mode.
sentences.chinese: 在街機模式下完成一次翻滾。

sentences.english: Similarly in the arcades there were all sorts of spin offs.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的，大型街機遊戲也有各種各樣的周邊產品。

sentences.english: Challenge yourself in this addictive, easy to use, old-school arcade racing game.
sentences.chinese: 挑戰自己，在此上癮，容易使用，老派街機賽車遊戲。

sentences.english: SMILES HD, the cheerful award winning solitaire-like and arcade matching game.
sentences.chinese: 的獲獎接龍般的和街機配對遊戲。

sentences.english: Space Falcon Commander is a classic arcade shootem up game.
sentences.chinese: 空間獵鷹指揮官是一個典型的街機射擊賽。

sentences.english: However, arcades remain popular in Japan and greater Asia.
sentences.chinese: 但是在日本和亞洲的其他許多地方，街機仍然很流行。

sentences.english: Gear Wager is a casual arcade game with a single button press game-play.
sentences.chinese: 齒輪賭注是與單個按鈕按遊戲休閒街機遊戲。

sentences.english: Iconic video arcade game Pac-Man is celebrating 30 years today.
sentences.chinese: 標誌性的視頻街機遊戲喫豆人正在慶祝30年的今天。

sentences.english: The basic premise is to provide the player an arcade-style limitless supply of monsters and pickups .
sentences.chinese: 基本的前提是要提供玩家街機無限供給怪獸和皮卡。

definition: nothing for nothing/you get what you pay for
pinyin: yi1 fen1 qian2 yi1 fen1 huo4

definition: flip-top (mobile phone, handbag etc)/to rebuild/to renovate
lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1
